ayah: سَبَّحَ لِلَّهِ مَا فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَمَا فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِۖ وَهُوَ ٱلۡعَزِيزُ ٱلۡحَكِيمُ
ayah_translit: sabbaha lillahi ma fi al-samawati wama fi al-ardi wahuwa al-'azizu al-hakimu
ayah_english: Glorifies [to] Allah whatever (is) in the heavens and whatever (is) in the earth And He (is) the All-Mighty the All-Wise

ayah: سَبَّحَ لِلَّهِ مَا فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَمَا فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِۖ وَهُوَ ٱلۡعَزِيزُ ٱلۡحَكِيمُ

ayah: هُوَ ٱلَّذِيٓ أَخۡرَجَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ مِنۡ أَهۡلِ ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ مِن دِيَٰرِهِمۡ لِأَوَّلِ ٱلۡحَشۡرِۚ مَا ظَنَنتُمۡ أَن يَخۡرُجُواْۖ وَظَنُّوٓاْ أَنَّهُم مَّانِعَتُهُمۡ حُصُونُهُم مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ فَأَتَىٰهُمُ ٱللَّهُ مِنۡ حَيۡثُ لَمۡ يَحۡتَسِبُواْۖ وَقَذَفَ فِي قُلُوبِهِمُ ٱلرُّعۡبَۚ يُخۡرِبُونَ بُيُوتَهُم بِأَيۡدِيهِمۡ وَأَيۡدِي ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ فَٱعۡتَبِرُواْ يَـٰٓأُوْلِي ٱلۡأَبۡصَٰرِ
ayah_translit: huwa alladhi akhraja alladhina kafaru min ahli al-kitabi min diyarihim li-awwali al-hashri ma zanantum an yakhruju wazannu annahum mani'atuhum husunuhum mina al-lahi fa-atahumu al-lahu min haythu lam yahtasibu waqadhafa fi qulubihimu al-ru'ba yukh'ribuna buyutahum bi-aydihim wa-aydi al-mu'minina fa-i'tabiru yauli al-absari
ayah_english: He (is) the One Who expelled those who disbelieved from (the) People (of) the Scripture from their homes at (the) first gathering Not you think that they would leave and they thought that [they] would defend them their fortresses against Allah But came to them Allah from where not they expected and He cast into their hearts [the] terror they destroyed their houses with their hands and the hands (of) the believers So take a lesson O those endowed (with) insight

ayah: هُوَ ٱلَّذِيٓ أَخۡرَجَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ مِنۡ أَهۡلِ ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ مِن دِيَٰرِهِمۡ لِأَوَّلِ ٱلۡحَشۡرِۚ مَا ظَنَنتُمۡ أَن يَخۡرُجُواْۖ وَظَنُّوٓاْ أَنَّهُم مَّانِعَتُهُمۡ حُصُونُهُم مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ فَأَتَىٰهُمُ ٱللَّهُ مِنۡ حَيۡثُ لَمۡ يَحۡتَسِبُواْۖ وَقَذَفَ فِي قُلُوبِهِمُ ٱلرُّعۡبَۚ يُخۡرِبُونَ بُيُوتَهُم بِأَيۡدِيهِمۡ وَأَيۡدِي ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ فَٱعۡتَبِرُواْ يَـٰٓأُوْلِي ٱلۡأَبۡصَٰرِ
ayah_translit: huwa alladhi akhraja alladhina kafaru min ahli al-kitabi min diyarihim li-awwali al-hashri ma zanantum an yakhruju wazannu annahum mani'atuhum husunuhum mina al-lahi fa-atahumu al-lahu min haythu lam yahtasibu waqadhafa fi qulubihimu al-ru'ba yukh'ribuna buyutahum bi-aydihim wa-aydi al-mu'minina fa-i'tabiru yauli al-absari

ayah: هُوَ ٱلَّذِيٓ أَخۡرَجَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ مِنۡ أَهۡلِ ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ مِن دِيَٰرِهِمۡ لِأَوَّلِ ٱلۡحَشۡرِۚ مَا ظَنَنتُمۡ أَن يَخۡرُجُواْۖ وَظَنُّوٓاْ أَنَّهُم مَّانِعَتُهُمۡ حُصُونُهُم مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ فَأَتَىٰهُمُ ٱللَّهُ مِنۡ حَيۡثُ لَمۡ يَحۡتَسِبُواْۖ وَقَذَفَ فِي قُلُوبِهِمُ ٱلرُّعۡبَۚ يُخۡرِبُونَ بُيُوتَهُم بِأَيۡدِيهِمۡ وَأَيۡدِي ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ فَٱعۡتَبِرُواْ يَـٰٓأُوْلِي ٱلۡأَبۡصَٰرِ

ayah_english: He (is) the One Who expelled those who disbelieved from (the) People (of) the Scripture from their homes at (the) first gathering Not you think that they would leave and they thought that [they] would defend them their fortresses against Allah But came to them Allah from where not they expected and He cast into their hearts [the] terror they destroyed their houses with their hands and the hands (of) the believers So take a lesson O those endowed (with) insight

ayah: هُوَ ٱلَّذِيٓ أَخۡرَجَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ مِنۡ أَهۡلِ ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ مِن دِيَٰرِهِمۡ لِأَوَّلِ ٱلۡحَشۡرِۚ مَا ظَنَنتُمۡ أَن يَخۡرُجُواْۖ وَظَنُّوٓاْ أَنَّهُم مَّانِعَتُهُمۡ حُصُونُهُم مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ فَأَتَىٰهُمُ ٱللَّهُ مِنۡ حَيۡثُ لَمۡ يَحۡتَسِبُواْۖ وَقَذَفَ فِي قُلُوبِهِمُ ٱلرُّعۡبَۚ يُخۡرِبُونَ بُيُوتَهُم بِأَيۡدِيهِمۡ وَأَيۡدِي ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ فَٱعۡتَبِرُواْ يَـٰٓأُوْلِي ٱلۡأَبۡصَٰرِ

ayah: هُوَ ٱلَّذِيٓ أَخۡرَجَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ مِنۡ أَهۡلِ ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ مِن دِيَٰرِهِمۡ لِأَوَّلِ ٱلۡحَشۡرِۚ مَا ظَنَنتُمۡ أَن يَخۡرُجُواْۖ وَظَنُّوٓاْ أَنَّهُم مَّانِعَتُهُمۡ حُصُونُهُم مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ فَأَتَىٰهُمُ ٱللَّهُ مِنۡ حَيۡثُ لَمۡ يَحۡتَسِبُواْۖ وَقَذَفَ فِي قُلُوبِهِمُ ٱلرُّعۡبَۚ يُخۡرِبُونَ بُيُوتَهُم بِأَيۡدِيهِمۡ وَأَيۡدِي ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ فَٱعۡتَبِرُواْ يَـٰٓأُوْلِي ٱلۡأَبۡصَٰرِ
ayah_translit: huwa alladhi akhraja alladhina kafaru min ahli al-kitabi min diyarihim li-awwali al-hashri ma zanantum an yakhruju wazannu annahum mani'atuhum husunuhum mina al-lahi fa-atahumu al-lahu min haythu lam yahtasibu waqadhafa fi qulubihimu al-ru'ba yukh'ribuna buyutahum bi-aydihim wa-aydi al-mu'minina fa-i'tabiru yauli al-absari
ayah_english: He (is) the One Who expelled those who disbelieved from (the) People (of) the Scripture from their homes at (the) first gathering Not you think that they would leave and they thought that [they] would defend them their fortresses against Allah But came to them Allah from where not they expected and He cast into their hearts [the] terror they destroyed their houses with their hands and the hands (of) the believers So take a lesson O those endowed (with) insight

ayah: وَلَوۡلَآ أَن كَتَبَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَيۡهِمُ ٱلۡجَلَآءَ لَعَذَّبَهُمۡ فِي ٱلدُّنۡيَاۖ وَلَهُمۡ فِي ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ عَذَابُ ٱلنَّارِ
ayah_translit: walawla an kataba al-lahu alayhimu al-jalaa la'adhabahum fi al-dun'ya walahum fi al-akhirati adhabu al-nari
ayah_english: And if not [that] (had) decreed Allah for them the exile certainly He (would) have punished them in the world and for them in the Hereafter (is) a punishment (of) the Fire

ayah: وَلَوۡلَآ أَن كَتَبَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَيۡهِمُ ٱلۡجَلَآءَ لَعَذَّبَهُمۡ فِي ٱلدُّنۡيَاۖ وَلَهُمۡ فِي ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ عَذَابُ ٱلنَّارِ

ayah: ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّهُمۡ شَآقُّواْ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥۖ وَمَن يُشَآقِّ ٱللَّهَ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ شَدِيدُ ٱلۡعِقَابِ
ayah_translit: dhalika bi-annahum shaqqu al-laha warasulahu waman yushaqqi al-laha fa-inna al-laha shadidu al-'iqabi
ayah_english: That (is) because [they] they opposed Allah and His Messenger And whoever opposes Allah then indeed Allah (is) severe (in) penalty

ayah: مَا قَطَعۡتُم مِّن لِّينَةٍ أَوۡ تَرَكۡتُمُوهَا قَآئِمَةً عَلَىٰٓ أُصُولِهَا فَبِإِذۡنِ ٱللَّهِ وَلِيُخۡزِيَ ٱلۡفَٰسِقِينَ
ayah_translit: ma qata'tum min linatin aw taraktumuha qaimatan ala usuliha fabi-idh'ni al-lahi waliyukh'ziya al-fasiqina
ayah_english: Whatever you cut down of (the) palm-trees or you left them standing on their roots it (was) by the permission (of) Allah and that He may disgrace the defiantly disobedient

ayah: مَا قَطَعۡتُم مِّن لِّينَةٍ أَوۡ تَرَكۡتُمُوهَا قَآئِمَةً عَلَىٰٓ أُصُولِهَا فَبِإِذۡنِ ٱللَّهِ وَلِيُخۡزِيَ ٱلۡفَٰسِقِينَ

ayah_translit: ma qata'tum min linatin aw taraktumuha qaimatan ala usuliha fabi-idh'ni al-lahi waliyukh'ziya al-fasiqina
ayah_english: Whatever you cut down of (the) palm-trees or you left them standing on their roots it (was) by the permission (of) Allah and that He may disgrace the defiantly disobedient

ayah: مَا قَطَعۡتُم مِّن لِّينَةٍ أَوۡ تَرَكۡتُمُوهَا قَآئِمَةً عَلَىٰٓ أُصُولِهَا فَبِإِذۡنِ ٱللَّهِ وَلِيُخۡزِيَ ٱلۡفَٰسِقِينَ

ayah_english: Whatever you cut down of (the) palm-trees or you left them standing on their roots it (was) by the permission (of) Allah and that He may disgrace the defiantly disobedient

ayah: مَا قَطَعۡتُم مِّن لِّينَةٍ أَوۡ تَرَكۡتُمُوهَا قَآئِمَةً عَلَىٰٓ أُصُولِهَا فَبِإِذۡنِ ٱللَّهِ وَلِيُخۡزِيَ ٱلۡفَٰسِقِينَ
ayah_translit: ma qata'tum min linatin aw taraktumuha qaimatan ala usuliha fabi-idh'ni al-lahi waliyukh'ziya al-fasiqina
ayah_english: Whatever you cut down of (the) palm-trees or you left them standing on their roots it (was) by the permission (of) Allah and that He may disgrace the defiantly disobedient

ayah: وَمَآ أَفَآءَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ رَسُولِهِۦ مِنۡهُمۡ فَمَآ أَوۡجَفۡتُمۡ عَلَيۡهِ مِنۡ خَيۡلٖ وَلَا رِكَابٖ وَلَٰكِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يُسَلِّطُ رُسُلَهُۥ عَلَىٰ مَن يَشَآءُۚ وَٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ قَدِيرٞ
ayah_translit: wama afaa al-lahu ala rasulihi min'hum fama awjaftum alayhi min khaylin wala rikabin walakinna al-laha yusallitu rusulahu ala man yashau wal-lahu ala kulli shayin qadirun
ayah_english: And what (was) restored (by) Allah to His Messenger from them then not you made expedition for it of horses and not camels but Allah gives power (to) His Messengers over whom He wills And Allah (is) on every thing All-Powerful

ayah: وَمَآ أَفَآءَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ رَسُولِهِۦ مِنۡهُمۡ فَمَآ أَوۡجَفۡتُمۡ عَلَيۡهِ مِنۡ خَيۡلٖ وَلَا رِكَابٖ وَلَٰكِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يُسَلِّطُ رُسُلَهُۥ عَلَىٰ مَن يَشَآءُۚ وَٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ قَدِيرٞ

ayah: وَمَآ أَفَآءَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ رَسُولِهِۦ مِنۡهُمۡ فَمَآ أَوۡجَفۡتُمۡ عَلَيۡهِ مِنۡ خَيۡلٖ وَلَا رِكَابٖ وَلَٰكِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يُسَلِّطُ رُسُلَهُۥ عَلَىٰ مَن يَشَآءُۚ وَٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ قَدِيرٞ

ayah: مَّآ أَفَآءَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ رَسُولِهِۦ مِنۡ أَهۡلِ ٱلۡقُرَىٰ فَلِلَّهِ وَلِلرَّسُولِ وَلِذِي ٱلۡقُرۡبَىٰ وَٱلۡيَتَٰمَىٰ وَٱلۡمَسَٰكِينِ وَٱبۡنِ ٱلسَّبِيلِ كَيۡ لَا يَكُونَ دُولَةَۢ بَيۡنَ ٱلۡأَغۡنِيَآءِ مِنكُمۡۚ وَمَآ ءَاتَىٰكُمُ ٱلرَّسُولُ فَخُذُوهُ وَمَا نَهَىٰكُمۡ عَنۡهُ فَٱنتَهُواْۚ وَٱتَّقُواْ ٱللَّهَۖ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ شَدِيدُ ٱلۡعِقَابِ
ayah_translit: ma afaa al-lahu ala rasulihi min ahli al-qura falillahi walilrrasuli walidhi al-qur'ba wal-yatama wal-masakini wa-ib'ni al-sabili kay la yakuna dulatan bayna al-aghniyai minkum wama atakumu al-rasulu fakhudhuhu wama nahakum anhu fa-intahu wa-ittaqu al-laha inna al-laha shadidu al-'iqabi
ayah_english: What (was) restored (by) Allah to His Messenger from (the) people (of) the towns (it is) for Allah and His Messenger and for those (of) the kindred and the orphans and the needy and the wayfarer that not it becomes a (perpetual) circulation between the rich among you And whatever gives you the Messenger take it and whatever he forbids you from it refrain And fear Allah Indeed Allah (is) severe (in) penalty

ayah: مَّآ أَفَآءَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ رَسُولِهِۦ مِنۡ أَهۡلِ ٱلۡقُرَىٰ فَلِلَّهِ وَلِلرَّسُولِ وَلِذِي ٱلۡقُرۡبَىٰ وَٱلۡيَتَٰمَىٰ وَٱلۡمَسَٰكِينِ وَٱبۡنِ ٱلسَّبِيلِ كَيۡ لَا يَكُونَ دُولَةَۢ بَيۡنَ ٱلۡأَغۡنِيَآءِ مِنكُمۡۚ وَمَآ ءَاتَىٰكُمُ ٱلرَّسُولُ فَخُذُوهُ وَمَا نَهَىٰكُمۡ عَنۡهُ فَٱنتَهُواْۚ وَٱتَّقُواْ ٱللَّهَۖ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ شَدِيدُ ٱلۡعِقَابِ

ayah: لِلۡفُقَرَآءِ ٱلۡمُهَٰجِرِينَ ٱلَّذِينَ أُخۡرِجُواْ مِن دِيَٰرِهِمۡ وَأَمۡوَٰلِهِمۡ يَبۡتَغُونَ فَضۡلٗا مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ وَرِضۡوَٰنٗا وَيَنصُرُونَ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥٓۚ أُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلصَّـٰدِقُونَ
ayah_translit: lil'fuqarai al-muhajirina alladhina ukh'riju min diyarihim wa-amwalihim yabtaghuna fadlan mina al-lahi warid'wanan wayansuruna al-laha warasulahu ulaika humu al-sadiquna
ayah_english: For the poor emigrants those who were expelled from their homes and their properties seeking bounty from Allah and pleasure and helping Allah and His Messenger Those they (are) the truthful

ayah: لِلۡفُقَرَآءِ ٱلۡمُهَٰجِرِينَ ٱلَّذِينَ أُخۡرِجُواْ مِن دِيَٰرِهِمۡ وَأَمۡوَٰلِهِمۡ يَبۡتَغُونَ فَضۡلٗا مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ وَرِضۡوَٰنٗا وَيَنصُرُونَ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥٓۚ أُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلصَّـٰدِقُونَ

ayah: لِلۡفُقَرَآءِ ٱلۡمُهَٰجِرِينَ ٱلَّذِينَ أُخۡرِجُواْ مِن دِيَٰرِهِمۡ وَأَمۡوَٰلِهِمۡ يَبۡتَغُونَ فَضۡلٗا مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ وَرِضۡوَٰنٗا وَيَنصُرُونَ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥٓۚ أُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلصَّـٰدِقُونَ

ayah_english: For the poor emigrants those who were expelled from their homes and their properties seeking bounty from Allah and pleasure and helping Allah and His Messenger Those they (are) the truthful

ayah: وَٱلَّذِينَ تَبَوَّءُو ٱلدَّارَ وَٱلۡإِيمَٰنَ مِن قَبۡلِهِمۡ يُحِبُّونَ مَنۡ هَاجَرَ إِلَيۡهِمۡ وَلَا يَجِدُونَ فِي صُدُورِهِمۡ حَاجَةٗ مِّمَّآ أُوتُواْ وَيُؤۡثِرُونَ عَلَىٰٓ أَنفُسِهِمۡ وَلَوۡ كَانَ بِهِمۡ خَصَاصَةٞۚ وَمَن يُوقَ شُحَّ نَفۡسِهِۦ فَأُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلۡمُفۡلِحُونَ
ayah_translit: wa-alladhina tabawwau al-dara wal-imana min qablihim yuhibbuna man hajara ilayhim wala yajiduna fi sudurihim hajatan mimma utu wayu'thiruna ala anfusihim walaw kana bihim khasasatun waman yuqa shuhha nafsihi fa-ulaika humu al-muf'lihuna
ayah_english: And those who settled (in) the home and (accepted) faith from before them love (those) who emigrated to them and not they find in their breasts any want of what they were given but prefer over themselves even though was with them poverty And whoever is saved (from) stinginess (of) his soul then those [they] (are) the successful ones

ayah: وَٱلَّذِينَ تَبَوَّءُو ٱلدَّارَ وَٱلۡإِيمَٰنَ مِن قَبۡلِهِمۡ يُحِبُّونَ مَنۡ هَاجَرَ إِلَيۡهِمۡ وَلَا يَجِدُونَ فِي صُدُورِهِمۡ حَاجَةٗ مِّمَّآ أُوتُواْ وَيُؤۡثِرُونَ عَلَىٰٓ أَنفُسِهِمۡ وَلَوۡ كَانَ بِهِمۡ خَصَاصَةٞۚ وَمَن يُوقَ شُحَّ نَفۡسِهِۦ فَأُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلۡمُفۡلِحُونَ

ayah_english: And those who settled (in) the home and (accepted) faith from before them love (those) who emigrated to them and not they find in their breasts any want of what they were given but prefer over themselves even though was with them poverty And whoever is saved (from) stinginess (of) his soul then those [they] (are) the successful ones

ayah: وَٱلَّذِينَ تَبَوَّءُو ٱلدَّارَ وَٱلۡإِيمَٰنَ مِن قَبۡلِهِمۡ يُحِبُّونَ مَنۡ هَاجَرَ إِلَيۡهِمۡ وَلَا يَجِدُونَ فِي صُدُورِهِمۡ حَاجَةٗ مِّمَّآ أُوتُواْ وَيُؤۡثِرُونَ عَلَىٰٓ أَنفُسِهِمۡ وَلَوۡ كَانَ بِهِمۡ خَصَاصَةٞۚ وَمَن يُوقَ شُحَّ نَفۡسِهِۦ فَأُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلۡمُفۡلِحُونَ

ayah: وَٱلَّذِينَ جَآءُو مِنۢ بَعۡدِهِمۡ يَقُولُونَ رَبَّنَا ٱغۡفِرۡ لَنَا وَلِإِخۡوَٰنِنَا ٱلَّذِينَ سَبَقُونَا بِٱلۡإِيمَٰنِ وَلَا تَجۡعَلۡ فِي قُلُوبِنَا غِلّٗا لِّلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ رَبَّنَآ إِنَّكَ رَءُوفٞ رَّحِيمٌ
ayah_translit: wa-alladhina jau min ba'dihim yaquluna rabbana igh'fir lana wali-ikh'wanina alladhina sabaquna bil-imani wala taj'al fi qulubina ghillan lilladhina amanu rabbana innaka raufun rahimun
ayah_english: And those who came from after them they say Our Lord forgive us and our brothers who preceded us in faith and (do) not put in our hearts any rancor towards those who believed Our Lord indeed You (are) Full of Kindness Most Merciful

ayah: وَٱلَّذِينَ جَآءُو مِنۢ بَعۡدِهِمۡ يَقُولُونَ رَبَّنَا ٱغۡفِرۡ لَنَا وَلِإِخۡوَٰنِنَا ٱلَّذِينَ سَبَقُونَا بِٱلۡإِيمَٰنِ وَلَا تَجۡعَلۡ فِي قُلُوبِنَا غِلّٗا لِّلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ رَبَّنَآ إِنَّكَ رَءُوفٞ رَّحِيمٌ

ayah: وَٱلَّذِينَ جَآءُو مِنۢ بَعۡدِهِمۡ يَقُولُونَ رَبَّنَا ٱغۡفِرۡ لَنَا وَلِإِخۡوَٰنِنَا ٱلَّذِينَ سَبَقُونَا بِٱلۡإِيمَٰنِ وَلَا تَجۡعَلۡ فِي قُلُوبِنَا غِلّٗا لِّلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ رَبَّنَآ إِنَّكَ رَءُوفٞ رَّحِيمٌ

ayah_translit: wa-alladhina jau min ba'dihim yaquluna rabbana igh'fir lana wali-ikh'wanina alladhina sabaquna bil-imani wala taj'al fi qulubina ghillan lilladhina amanu rabbana innaka raufun rahimun
ayah_english: And those who came from after them they say Our Lord forgive us and our brothers who preceded us in faith and (do) not put in our hearts any rancor towards those who believed Our Lord indeed You (are) Full of Kindness Most Merciful

ayah: ۞أَلَمۡ تَرَ إِلَى ٱلَّذِينَ نَافَقُواْ يَقُولُونَ لِإِخۡوَٰنِهِمُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ مِنۡ أَهۡلِ ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ لَئِنۡ أُخۡرِجۡتُمۡ لَنَخۡرُجَنَّ مَعَكُمۡ وَلَا نُطِيعُ فِيكُمۡ أَحَدًا أَبَدٗا وَإِن قُوتِلۡتُمۡ لَنَنصُرَنَّكُمۡ وَٱللَّهُ يَشۡهَدُ إِنَّهُمۡ لَكَٰذِبُونَ
ayah_translit: alam tara ila alladhina nafaqu yaquluna li-ikh'wanihimu alladhina kafaru min ahli al-kitabi la-in ukh'rij'tum lanakhrujanna ma'akum wala nuti'u fikum ahadan abadan wa-in qutil'tum lanansurannakum wal-lahu yashhadu innahum lakadhibuna
ayah_english: Do not you see [to] those who (were) hypocrites saying to their brothers those who disbelieved among the People (of) the Scripture If you are expelled surely we will leave with you and not we will obey concerning you anyone ever and if you are fought certainly we will help you And Allah bears witness that they (are) surely liars

ayah: ۞أَلَمۡ تَرَ إِلَى ٱلَّذِينَ نَافَقُواْ يَقُولُونَ لِإِخۡوَٰنِهِمُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ مِنۡ أَهۡلِ ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ لَئِنۡ أُخۡرِجۡتُمۡ لَنَخۡرُجَنَّ مَعَكُمۡ وَلَا نُطِيعُ فِيكُمۡ أَحَدًا أَبَدٗا وَإِن قُوتِلۡتُمۡ لَنَنصُرَنَّكُمۡ وَٱللَّهُ يَشۡهَدُ إِنَّهُمۡ لَكَٰذِبُونَ

ayah: ۞أَلَمۡ تَرَ إِلَى ٱلَّذِينَ نَافَقُواْ يَقُولُونَ لِإِخۡوَٰنِهِمُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ مِنۡ أَهۡلِ ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ لَئِنۡ أُخۡرِجۡتُمۡ لَنَخۡرُجَنَّ مَعَكُمۡ وَلَا نُطِيعُ فِيكُمۡ أَحَدًا أَبَدٗا وَإِن قُوتِلۡتُمۡ لَنَنصُرَنَّكُمۡ وَٱللَّهُ يَشۡهَدُ إِنَّهُمۡ لَكَٰذِبُونَ

ayah_translit: alam tara ila alladhina nafaqu yaquluna li-ikh'wanihimu alladhina kafaru min ahli al-kitabi la-in ukh'rij'tum lanakhrujanna ma'akum wala nuti'u fikum ahadan abadan wa-in qutil'tum lanansurannakum wal-lahu yashhadu innahum lakadhibuna

ayah: لَئِنۡ أُخۡرِجُواْ لَا يَخۡرُجُونَ مَعَهُمۡ وَلَئِن قُوتِلُواْ لَا يَنصُرُونَهُمۡ وَلَئِن نَّصَرُوهُمۡ لَيُوَلُّنَّ ٱلۡأَدۡبَٰرَ ثُمَّ لَا يُنصَرُونَ
ayah_translit: la-in ukh'riju la yakhrujuna ma'ahum wala-in qutilu la yansurunahum wala-in nasaruhum layuwallunna al-adbara thumma la yunsaruna
ayah_english: If they are expelled not they will leave with them and if they are fought not they will help them And if they help them certainly they will turn (their) backs; then not they will be helped

ayah: لَئِنۡ أُخۡرِجُواْ لَا يَخۡرُجُونَ مَعَهُمۡ وَلَئِن قُوتِلُواْ لَا يَنصُرُونَهُمۡ وَلَئِن نَّصَرُوهُمۡ لَيُوَلُّنَّ ٱلۡأَدۡبَٰرَ ثُمَّ لَا يُنصَرُونَ
ayah_translit: la-in ukh'riju la yakhrujuna ma'ahum wala-in qutilu la yansurunahum wala-in nasaruhum layuwallunna al-adbara thumma la yunsaruna

ayah_english: If they are expelled not they will leave with them and if they are fought not they will help them And if they help them certainly they will turn (their) backs; then not they will be helped

ayah: لَأَنتُمۡ أَشَدُّ رَهۡبَةٗ فِي صُدُورِهِم مِّنَ ٱللَّهِۚ ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّهُمۡ قَوۡمٞ لَّا يَفۡقَهُونَ
ayah_translit: la-antum ashaddu rahbatan fi sudurihim mina al-lahi dhalika bi-annahum qawmun la yafqahuna
ayah_english: Certainly you(r) (are) more intense (in) fear in their breasts than Allah That (is) because they (are) a people (who do) not understand

ayah: لَا يُقَٰتِلُونَكُمۡ جَمِيعًا إِلَّا فِي قُرٗى مُّحَصَّنَةٍ أَوۡ مِن وَرَآءِ جُدُرِۭۚ بَأۡسُهُم بَيۡنَهُمۡ شَدِيدٞۚ تَحۡسَبُهُمۡ جَمِيعٗا وَقُلُوبُهُمۡ شَتَّىٰۚ ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّهُمۡ قَوۡمٞ لَّا يَعۡقِلُونَ
ayah_translit: la yuqatilunakum jami'an illa fi quran muhassanatin aw min warai judurin basuhum baynahum shadidun tahsabuhum jami'an waqulubuhum shatta dhalika bi-annahum qawmun la ya'qiluna
ayah_english: Not will they fight you all except in towns fortified or from behind walls Their violence among themselves (is) severe You think they (are) united but their hearts (are) divided That (is) because they (are) a people not they reason

ayah: لَا يُقَٰتِلُونَكُمۡ جَمِيعًا إِلَّا فِي قُرٗى مُّحَصَّنَةٍ أَوۡ مِن وَرَآءِ جُدُرِۭۚ بَأۡسُهُم بَيۡنَهُمۡ شَدِيدٞۚ تَحۡسَبُهُمۡ جَمِيعٗا وَقُلُوبُهُمۡ شَتَّىٰۚ ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّهُمۡ قَوۡمٞ لَّا يَعۡقِلُونَ

ayah: لَا يُقَٰتِلُونَكُمۡ جَمِيعًا إِلَّا فِي قُرٗى مُّحَصَّنَةٍ أَوۡ مِن وَرَآءِ جُدُرِۭۚ بَأۡسُهُم بَيۡنَهُمۡ شَدِيدٞۚ تَحۡسَبُهُمۡ جَمِيعٗا وَقُلُوبُهُمۡ شَتَّىٰۚ ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّهُمۡ قَوۡمٞ لَّا يَعۡقِلُونَ

ayah_english: Not will they fight you all except in towns fortified or from behind walls Their violence among themselves (is) severe You think they (are) united but their hearts (are) divided That (is) because they (are) a people not they reason

ayah: كَمَثَلِ ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبۡلِهِمۡ قَرِيبٗاۖ ذَاقُواْ وَبَالَ أَمۡرِهِمۡ وَلَهُمۡ عَذَابٌ أَلِيمٞ
ayah_translit: kamathali alladhina min qablihim qariban dhaqu wabala amrihim walahum adhabun alimun
ayah_english: Like (the) example (of) those from before them shortly they tasted (the) evil result (of) their affair and for them (is) a punishment painful

ayah: كَمَثَلِ ٱلشَّيۡطَٰنِ إِذۡ قَالَ لِلۡإِنسَٰنِ ٱكۡفُرۡ فَلَمَّا كَفَرَ قَالَ إِنِّي بَرِيٓءٞ مِّنكَ إِنِّيٓ أَخَافُ ٱللَّهَ رَبَّ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ
ayah_translit: kamathali al-shaytani idh qala lil'insani uk'fur falamma kafara qala inni barion minka inni akhafu al-laha rabba al-'alamina
ayah_english: Like (the) example (of) the Shaitaan when he says to man Disbelieve But when he disbelieves he says Indeed I am disassociated from you Indeed [I] I fear Allah (the) Lord (of) the worlds

ayah: كَمَثَلِ ٱلشَّيۡطَٰنِ إِذۡ قَالَ لِلۡإِنسَٰنِ ٱكۡفُرۡ فَلَمَّا كَفَرَ قَالَ إِنِّي بَرِيٓءٞ مِّنكَ إِنِّيٓ أَخَافُ ٱللَّهَ رَبَّ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ

ayah: كَمَثَلِ ٱلشَّيۡطَٰنِ إِذۡ قَالَ لِلۡإِنسَٰنِ ٱكۡفُرۡ فَلَمَّا كَفَرَ قَالَ إِنِّي بَرِيٓءٞ مِّنكَ إِنِّيٓ أَخَافُ ٱللَّهَ رَبَّ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ

ayah: فَكَانَ عَٰقِبَتَهُمَآ أَنَّهُمَا فِي ٱلنَّارِ خَٰلِدَيۡنِ فِيهَاۚ وَذَٰلِكَ جَزَـٰٓؤُاْ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ
ayah_translit: fakana aqibatahuma annahuma fi al-nari khalidayni fiha wadhalika jazau al-zalimina
ayah_english: So will be (the) end of both of them that they will (be) in the Fire abiding forever therein And that (is the) recompense (of) the wrongdoers

ayah: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ ٱتَّقُواْ ٱللَّهَ وَلۡتَنظُرۡ نَفۡسٞ مَّا قَدَّمَتۡ لِغَدٖۖ وَٱتَّقُواْ ٱللَّهَۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ خَبِيرُۢ بِمَا تَعۡمَلُونَ
ayah_translit: yaayyuha alladhina amanu ittaqu al-laha waltanzur nafsun ma qaddamat lighadin wa-ittaqu al-laha inna al-laha khabirun bima ta'maluna
ayah_english: O you (who) believe Fear Allah and let look every soul what it has sent forth for tomorrow and fear Allah Indeed Allah (is) All-Aware of what you do

ayah: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ ٱتَّقُواْ ٱللَّهَ وَلۡتَنظُرۡ نَفۡسٞ مَّا قَدَّمَتۡ لِغَدٖۖ وَٱتَّقُواْ ٱللَّهَۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ خَبِيرُۢ بِمَا تَعۡمَلُونَ

ayah: وَلَا تَكُونُواْ كَٱلَّذِينَ نَسُواْ ٱللَّهَ فَأَنسَىٰهُمۡ أَنفُسَهُمۡۚ أُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلۡفَٰسِقُونَ
ayah_translit: wala takunu ka-alladhina nasu al-laha fa-ansahum anfusahum ulaika humu al-fasiquna
ayah_english: And (do) not be like those who forgot Allah so He made them forget themselves Those [they] (are) the defiantly disobedient

ayah: وَلَا تَكُونُواْ كَٱلَّذِينَ نَسُواْ ٱللَّهَ فَأَنسَىٰهُمۡ أَنفُسَهُمۡۚ أُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلۡفَٰسِقُونَ

ayah: لَا يَسۡتَوِيٓ أَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلنَّارِ وَأَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلۡجَنَّةِۚ أَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلۡجَنَّةِ هُمُ ٱلۡفَآئِزُونَ
ayah_translit: la yastawi ashabu al-nari wa-ashabu al-janati ashabu al-janati humu al-faizuna
ayah_english: Not are equal (the) companions (of) the Fire and (the) companions (of) Paradise (The) companions (of) Paradise they (are) achievers

ayah: لَوۡ أَنزَلۡنَا هَٰذَا ٱلۡقُرۡءَانَ عَلَىٰ جَبَلٖ لَّرَأَيۡتَهُۥ خَٰشِعٗا مُّتَصَدِّعٗا مِّنۡ خَشۡيَةِ ٱللَّهِۚ وَتِلۡكَ ٱلۡأَمۡثَٰلُ نَضۡرِبُهَا لِلنَّاسِ لَعَلَّهُمۡ يَتَفَكَّرُونَ
ayah_translit: law anzalna hadha al-qur'ana ala jabalin lara-aytahu khashi'an mutasaddi'an min khashyati al-lahi watil'ka al-amthalu nadribuha lilnnasi la'allahum yatafakkaruna
ayah_english: If We (had) sent down this Quran on a mountain surely you (would) have seen it humbled breaking asunder from (the) fear (of) Allah And these (are) the examples We present them to the people so that they may give thought

ayah: لَوۡ أَنزَلۡنَا هَٰذَا ٱلۡقُرۡءَانَ عَلَىٰ جَبَلٖ لَّرَأَيۡتَهُۥ خَٰشِعٗا مُّتَصَدِّعٗا مِّنۡ خَشۡيَةِ ٱللَّهِۚ وَتِلۡكَ ٱلۡأَمۡثَٰلُ نَضۡرِبُهَا لِلنَّاسِ لَعَلَّهُمۡ يَتَفَكَّرُونَ
ayah_translit: law anzalna hadha al-qur'ana ala jabalin lara-aytahu khashi'an mutasaddi'an min khashyati al-lahi watil'ka al-amthalu nadribuha lilnnasi la'allahum yatafakkaruna
ayah_english: If We (had) sent down this Quran on a mountain surely you (would) have seen it humbled breaking asunder from (the) fear (of) Allah And these (are) the examples We present them to the people so that they may give thought

ayah: لَوۡ أَنزَلۡنَا هَٰذَا ٱلۡقُرۡءَانَ عَلَىٰ جَبَلٖ لَّرَأَيۡتَهُۥ خَٰشِعٗا مُّتَصَدِّعٗا مِّنۡ خَشۡيَةِ ٱللَّهِۚ وَتِلۡكَ ٱلۡأَمۡثَٰلُ نَضۡرِبُهَا لِلنَّاسِ لَعَلَّهُمۡ يَتَفَكَّرُونَ

ayah: هُوَ ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِي لَآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَۖ عَٰلِمُ ٱلۡغَيۡبِ وَٱلشَّهَٰدَةِۖ هُوَ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ
ayah_translit: huwa al-lahu alladhi la ilaha illa huwa alimu al-ghaybi wal-shahadati huwa al-rahmanu al-rahimu
ayah_english: He (is) Allah the One Who (there is) no god but He (the) All-Knower (of) the unseen and the witnessed He (is) the Most Gracious the Most Merciful

ayah: هُوَ ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِي لَآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَۖ عَٰلِمُ ٱلۡغَيۡبِ وَٱلشَّهَٰدَةِۖ هُوَ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ
ayah_translit: huwa al-lahu alladhi la ilaha illa huwa alimu al-ghaybi wal-shahadati huwa al-rahmanu al-rahimu
ayah_english: He (is) Allah the One Who (there is) no god but He (the) All-Knower (of) the unseen and the witnessed He (is) the Most Gracious the Most Merciful

ayah: هُوَ ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِي لَآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَۖ عَٰلِمُ ٱلۡغَيۡبِ وَٱلشَّهَٰدَةِۖ هُوَ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ
ayah_translit: huwa al-lahu alladhi la ilaha illa huwa alimu al-ghaybi wal-shahadati huwa al-rahmanu al-rahimu
ayah_english: He (is) Allah the One Who (there is) no god but He (the) All-Knower (of) the unseen and the witnessed He (is) the Most Gracious the Most Merciful

ayah: هُوَ ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِي لَآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَۖ عَٰلِمُ ٱلۡغَيۡبِ وَٱلشَّهَٰدَةِۖ هُوَ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ

ayah_english: He (is) Allah the One Who (there is) no god but He (the) All-Knower (of) the unseen and the witnessed He (is) the Most Gracious the Most Merciful

ayah: هُوَ ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِي لَآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَۖ عَٰلِمُ ٱلۡغَيۡبِ وَٱلشَّهَٰدَةِۖ هُوَ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ
ayah_translit: huwa al-lahu alladhi la ilaha illa huwa alimu al-ghaybi wal-shahadati huwa al-rahmanu al-rahimu
ayah_english: He (is) Allah the One Who (there is) no god but He (the) All-Knower (of) the unseen and the witnessed He (is) the Most Gracious the Most Merciful

ayah: هُوَ ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِي لَآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ ٱلۡمَلِكُ ٱلۡقُدُّوسُ ٱلسَّلَٰمُ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنُ ٱلۡمُهَيۡمِنُ ٱلۡعَزِيزُ ٱلۡجَبَّارُ ٱلۡمُتَكَبِّرُۚ سُبۡحَٰنَ ٱللَّهِ عَمَّا يُشۡرِكُونَ
ayah_translit: huwa al-lahu alladhi la ilaha illa huwa al-maliku al-qudusu al-salamu al-mu'minu al-muhayminu al-'azizu al-jabaru al-mutakabiru sub'hana al-lahi amma yush'rikuna
ayah_english: He (is) Allah the One Who (there is) no god but He the Sovereign the Holy One the Giver of Peace the Giver of Security the Guardian the All-Mighty the Irresistible the Supreme Glory (be to) Allah from what they associate (with Him)

ayah: هُوَ ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِي لَآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ ٱلۡمَلِكُ ٱلۡقُدُّوسُ ٱلسَّلَٰمُ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنُ ٱلۡمُهَيۡمِنُ ٱلۡعَزِيزُ ٱلۡجَبَّارُ ٱلۡمُتَكَبِّرُۚ سُبۡحَٰنَ ٱللَّهِ عَمَّا يُشۡرِكُونَ
ayah_translit: huwa al-lahu alladhi la ilaha illa huwa al-maliku al-qudusu al-salamu al-mu'minu al-muhayminu al-'azizu al-jabaru al-mutakabiru sub'hana al-lahi amma yush'rikuna
ayah_english: He (is) Allah the One Who (there is) no god but He the Sovereign the Holy One the Giver of Peace the Giver of Security the Guardian the All-Mighty the Irresistible the Supreme Glory (be to) Allah from what they associate (with Him)

ayah: هُوَ ٱللَّهُ ٱلۡخَٰلِقُ ٱلۡبَارِئُ ٱلۡمُصَوِّرُۖ لَهُ ٱلۡأَسۡمَآءُ ٱلۡحُسۡنَىٰۚ يُسَبِّحُ لَهُۥ مَا فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۖ وَهُوَ ٱلۡعَزِيزُ ٱلۡحَكِيمُ
ayah_translit: huwa al-lahu al-khaliqu al-bari-u al-musawiru lahu al-asmau al-hus'na yusabbihu lahu ma fi al-samawati wal-ardi wahuwa al-'azizu al-hakimu
ayah_english: He (is) Allah the Creator the Inventor the Fashioner For Him (are) the names the beautiful Glorifies Him whatever (is) in the heavens and the earth And He (is) the All-Mighty the All-Wise

ayah: هُوَ ٱللَّهُ ٱلۡخَٰلِقُ ٱلۡبَارِئُ ٱلۡمُصَوِّرُۖ لَهُ ٱلۡأَسۡمَآءُ ٱلۡحُسۡنَىٰۚ يُسَبِّحُ لَهُۥ مَا فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۖ وَهُوَ ٱلۡعَزِيزُ ٱلۡحَكِيمُ
